ipxact:component.ipxact:name: JPEG-EX-F

ipxact:addressBlock.ipxact:name: regs
ipxact:addressBlock.ipxact:description: Control and Status registers - Register file

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: jpeg_hdr_p1_end
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: End address of JPEG header 1st part

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: end
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Address of the last byte of the 1st part of the JPEG header in the header/footer buffer.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: rsvd
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Reserved

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: end_base_qtable
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: End address of Base Quantisation tables

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: end
ipxact:field.ipxact:displayName: End address of Base Quantisation tables
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Address of the last byte of the Base Quantisation tables in the header/footer buffer. If video rate control is not used and thus the Base Quantisation tables are not required, set this to 0.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: rsvd
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: buffer. If video rate control is not used and thus the Base Quantisation tables

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: end
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Address of the last byte of Huffman table in the header/footer buffer. If this Huffman table is not used, this field is to be set to 0 and both the header output logic will skip this table.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: rsvd
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: buffer. If video rate control is not used and thus the Base Quantisation tables

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: end
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Address of the last byte of Huffman table in the header/footer buffer. If this Huffman table is not used, this field is to be set to 0 and both the header output logic will skip this table.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: rsvd
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Reserved

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: end
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Address of the last byte of Huffman table in the header/footer buffer. If this Huffman table is not used, this field is to be set to 0 and both the header output logic will skip this table.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: rsvd
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Reserved

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: end
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Address of the last byte of Huffman table in the header/footer buffer. If this Huffman table is not used, this field is to be set to 0 and both the header output logic will skip this table.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: rsvd
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Reserved

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: end
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Address of the last byte of the JPEG footer in the header/footer buffer.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: rsvd
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Reserved

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: enable
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: If set to 1, the core is enabled and ready to process incoming frames and if set to 0, the core will not process any frames and produce no output. Should the core run into an error (any bit in any pipe status register is non-zero), the core should be reset by writing first a 0 to this register and then a 1.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: ereset
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: If set to 1, reset the core if any error occurred (any bit in any pipe status register is set to non-zero) and wait for the next Start-of-Frame.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: rsvd0
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Reserved

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: rsvd1
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Reserved

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: huff0
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Huffman table selector for component 0.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: huff1
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Huffman table selector for component 1.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: huff2
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Huffman table selector for component 2.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: huff3
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Huffman table selector for component 3

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: quan0
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Quantisation table selector for component 0.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: quan1
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Quantisation table selector for component 1.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: quan2
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Quantisation table selector for component 2.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: quan3
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Quantisation table selector for component 3.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: qprec0
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Quantisation table 0 precision. Setting this to 0 selects 8-bit quantisation tables, while setting it to 1 selects 16-bit quantisation tables.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: qprec1
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Quantisation table 1 precision. Setting this to 0 selects 8-bit quantisation tables, while setting it to 1 selects 16-bit quantisation tables.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: qprec2
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Quantisation table 2 precision. Setting this to 0 selects 8-bit quantisation tables, while setting it to 1 selects 16-bit quantisation tables.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: qprec3
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Quantisation table 3 precision. Setting this to 0 selects 8-bit quantisation tables, while setting it to 1 selects 16-bit quantisation tables.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: rsvd2
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Reserved

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: dyn_en
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: If this bit is set, the core will finish processing the current frame and stall before accepting the next frame.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: dyn_empty
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Once bit [0] has been set, this bit indicates the state of the pipeline: 0: The pipeline is busy processing a frame: the encoder may not be reconfigured. 1: The pipeline is empty: the encoder may be reconfigured as desired.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: hsafe
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: While this bit is set to 1, it is safe to change the contents of the Header/Footer buffer. As soon as it is set to 0, it is expected that a coherent set of headers and footers may be found in the Header/Footer buffer.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: rsvd
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Reserved

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: hrc_en
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Image rate control enable bit. If set to 1 image rate control is enabled, if set to 0 image rate control is disabled.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: src_en
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Video rate control enable bit. If set to 1 video rate control is enabled, if set to 0 video rate control is disabled.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: src_mode
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: By default set tis field to 0. For the video rate control assisted image rate control, set this to 2.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: rsvd
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Reserved

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: ritarg
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Target bits for one correction period

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: rsvd_0
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Reserved

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: qitarg
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Target bits for one correction period.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: rsvd_1
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Reserved

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: icper
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Image rate control correction period (I.Correction period).

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: rsvd
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Reserved

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: iaper
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Image rate control averaging period (I.Averaging period).

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: vaper
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Video rate control averaging period expressed in a number of frames. Setting this register to 0 sets the averaging period to infinite.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: rsvd
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Reserved

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: vrc_size
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Target size for video rate control. This value is specified in the number of bits present in the ECS data (ie. output size in bits minus headers and the footer). If multiple scans are used, this is the sum of the ECS data in all scans.

ipxact:register.ipxact:name: vrc_min_target_size
ipxact:register.ipxact:description: Video rate control minimum target size

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: vrc_minsize
ipxact:field.ipxact:displayName: Video rate control minimum target size
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: The minimum encoded size in bits allowed to be targeted by the video rate control.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: vrctarg
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Set to the same value as register 0x5020

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: vrc_q
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Initial internal state vector. The value of this register depends on the rate control tables used. Refer to section Video rate control for the value to set this register to.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: tst_num
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Specifies the number of bytes to insert from the timestamp stream after the Header 1st part is output. If set to 0, then no data from the timestamp stream is inserted.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: rsvd
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Reserved

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: qt1
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Ouptut quantisation table 1 in output stream

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: qt2
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Ouptut quantisation table 2 in output stream

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: qt3
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Ouptut quantisation table 3 in output stream

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: qt4
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Ouptut quantisation table 4 in output stream

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: ht1
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Ouptut Huffman table 1 in output stream

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: ht2
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Ouptut Huffman table 2 in output stream

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: ht3
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Ouptut Huffman table 3 in output stream

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: ht4
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Ouptut Huffman table 4 in output stream

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: nfd
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: If this is set to one, then the next frame that is output will have all the tables marked by bits [7:0] output and once they are output, then bits [7:0] in this register will be set to 0 - ie. all following frames will have no tables output.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: atf
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: If this bit is set to one, then the next output ""image"" will only contain the tables as mentioned on bits [7:0] of this register and without an ECS data. Once the output has been completed, this bit is reset to 0. When this bit is set, the encoder behaves as follows: 1, Processing of the current frame is completed 2, Output is generated containing only the specified tables and no ECS data. This happens irrespective of whether the first sample of the next frame is received or not. 3, Normal processing resumes with the next frame

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: rsvd
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Reserved

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: oovf
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Assembly buffer overflow. This bit is sticky: when the overflow situation is over (eg. by encoder enable/disable) this bit will be set until it is written. Writing to this register resets this field to 0 irrespective of the value written.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: rsvd
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Reserved

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: t3
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: T1 constant

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: rsvd
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Reserved

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: t2
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: T1 constant

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: rsvd
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Reserved

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: t1
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: T1 constant

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: rsvd
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Reserved

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: t41
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: T4.1 constant

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: rsvd
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Reserved

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: t42
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: T4.2 constant

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: rsvd
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Reserved

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: tf
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Tf table entry

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: rien
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Enable restart marker generation

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: bri
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Number of blocks per restart interval minus one

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: rsvd
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Reserved

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: rev
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Core revision

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: min
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Core minor version

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: maj
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Core major version

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: hdf_size
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Header/footer RAM size in bytes.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: const4
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Constant 4.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: src
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: If set to 1, then the video rate control module is implemented, else if set to 0, it is not implemented.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: hrc
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: If set to 1, then the image rate control module is implemented, else if set to 0, it is not implemented.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: num_qua
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Number of quantisation tables implemented.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: num_huff
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Number of Huffman tables implemented.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: pbuf_size
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Size of the implemented pipe buffers in 32-bit words

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: qua_prec
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Gives the maximum precision of the implemented quantisation tables. The actual precision used is given in the Core Control register.

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: dat_i_type
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Gives the type of input samples the core expects on its input. The following values are valid: 0: The encoder expects unsigned input samples 1: The encoder expects signed input samples

ipxact:field.ipxact:name: obf_buf_size
ipxact:field.ipxact:description: Gives the number of bytes in the internal output buffer.

ipxact:moduleParameter.ipxact:name: DAT_I_W
ipxact:moduleParameter.ipxact:description: The number of bits in each input sample (range 8-12).

ipxact:moduleParameter.ipxact:name: DAT_I_TYPE
ipxact:moduleParameter.ipxact:description: Input sample type. 0 - unsigned input, 1 - signed input.

ipxact:moduleParameter.ipxact:name: QUA_NUM
ipxact:moduleParameter.ipxact:description: The number of Quantization tables implemented.

ipxact:moduleParameter.ipxact:name: HUF_NUM
ipxact:moduleParameter.ipxact:description: The number of Huffman tables implemented.

ipxact:moduleParameter.ipxact:name: OBUS_LEN
ipxact:moduleParameter.ipxact:description: The number of 8-bit bytes presented on the output in one cycle (4 or 8).

ipxact:moduleParameter.ipxact:name: OBF_BUF_SIZE
ipxact:moduleParameter.ipxact:description: Output buffer size in words (OBUS_LEN bytes). Must be the exponent of 2 and at least 2.

ipxact:moduleParameter.ipxact:name: OBF_MET_SIZE
ipxact:moduleParameter.ipxact:description: Metadata buffer size in words (MET_DAT_W bits). Must be the exponent of 2 and at least 2.

ipxact:moduleParameter.ipxact:name: HDF_SIZE
ipxact:moduleParameter.ipxact:description: Header/footer ram size in bytes. Must be a multiple of 4.

ipxact:moduleParameter.ipxact:name: TST_DEPTH
ipxact:moduleParameter.ipxact:description: Depth of TST fifo in bytes. TST_DEPTH must be the exponent of 2.

ipxact:moduleParameter.ipxact:name: IMP_HRC
ipxact:moduleParameter.ipxact:description: 1 - Hard rate control implemented, 0 - Hard rate control not implemented.

ipxact:moduleParameter.ipxact:name: IMP_SRC
ipxact:moduleParameter.ipxact:description: 1 - Soft rate control implemented, 0 - Soft rate control not implemented.

ipxact:moduleParameter.ipxact:name: RDY_C
ipxact:moduleParameter.ipxact:description: 1 - core is always ready, overlow might happen, 0 - rdy_i needs to be accounted for.

ipxact:moduleParameter.ipxact:name: PBUF_SIZE
ipxact:moduleParameter.ipxact:description: Pipe buffer size in words (1 word has PBUF_DAT_W bits). Must be the exponent of 2 and at least 2.

ipxact:moduleParameter.ipxact:name: SCAN_INF_DEPTH
ipxact:moduleParameter.ipxact:description: Depth of scan information fifos (SOS fifo and EOS fifo). Must be the exponent of 2 and at least 2.

ipxact:moduleParameter.ipxact:name: DCT_TYPE
ipxact:moduleParameter.ipxact:description: Type of DCT: '0' - generic, '1' - optimized for DSP48E1 blocks.

ipxact:component.ipxact:description: The JPEG Encoder core is an encoder core which takes raw image samples in its input, encodes it using the provided Huffman and Quantisation tables and outputs a fully standards compliant JPEG stream.

ipxact:parameter.ipxact:name: HUF_NUM
ipxact:parameter.ipxact:description: The number of Huffman tables implemented.

ipxact:parameter.ipxact:name: QUA_NUM
ipxact:parameter.ipxact:description: The number of Quantization tables implemented.

ipxact:parameter.ipxact:name: DAT_I_W
ipxact:parameter.ipxact:description: The number of bits in each input sample (range 8-12).

ipxact:parameter.ipxact:name: DAT_I_TYPE
ipxact:parameter.ipxact:description: Input sample type. 0 - unsigned input, 1 - signed input.

ipxact:parameter.ipxact:name: QUA_PREC
ipxact:parameter.ipxact:description: Precision of Quantization tables (8 or 16).

ipxact:parameter.ipxact:name: OBUS_LEN
ipxact:parameter.ipxact:description: The number of 8-bit bytes presented on the output in one cycle (4 or 8).

ipxact:parameter.ipxact:name: OBF_BUF_SIZE
ipxact:parameter.ipxact:description: Output buffer size in words (OBUS_LEN bytes). Must be the exponent of 2 and at least 2.

ipxact:parameter.ipxact:name: OBF_MET_SIZE
ipxact:parameter.ipxact:description: Metadata buffer size in words (MET_DAT_W bits). Must be the exponent of 2 and at least 2.

ipxact:parameter.ipxact:name: XP_HDF_SIZE_W
ipxact:parameter.ipxact:description: Header/footer ram address width - $clog2(HDF_SIZE)

ipxact:parameter.ipxact:name: HDF_SIZE
ipxact:parameter.ipxact:description: Header/footer ram size in bytes. Must be a multiple of 4.

ipxact:parameter.ipxact:name: TST_DEPTH
ipxact:parameter.ipxact:description: Depth of TST fifo in bytes. TST_DEPTH must be the exponent of 2.

ipxact:parameter.ipxact:name: IMP_HRC
ipxact:parameter.ipxact:description: 1 - Hard rate control implemented, 0 - Hard rate control not implemented.

ipxact:parameter.ipxact:name: IMP_SRC
ipxact:parameter.ipxact:description: 1 - Soft rate control implemented, 0 - Soft rate control not implemented.

ipxact:parameter.ipxact:name: RDY_C
ipxact:parameter.ipxact:description: 1 - core is always ready, overlow might happen, 0 - rdy_i needs to be accounted for.

ipxact:parameter.ipxact:name: PPE
ipxact:parameter.ipxact:description: Number of pipelines implemented

ipxact:parameter.ipxact:name: PBUF_SIZE
ipxact:parameter.ipxact:description: Pipe buffer size in words (1 word has PBUF_DAT_W bits). Must be the exponent of 2 and at least 2.

ipxact:parameter.ipxact:name: SCAN_INF_DEPTH
ipxact:parameter.ipxact:description: Depth of scan information fifos (SOS fifo and EOS fifo). Must be the exponent of 2 and at least 2.

ipxact:parameter.ipxact:name: CONST_HUFF
ipxact:parameter.ipxact:description: Use constant Huffman tables.

ipxact:parameter.ipxact:name: DCT_TYPE
ipxact:parameter.ipxact:description: Type of DCT: '0' - generic, '1' - optimized for DSP48E1 blocks.

ipxact:parameter.ipxact:name: DAT_O_W
ipxact:parameter.ipxact:description: Output bus width - depends on the OBUS_LEN parameter

ipxact:parameter.ipxact:name: OBUS_LEN_W
ipxact:parameter.ipxact:description: log2(OBUS_LEN)
